jobdescription: Job Description for Member Technical - Wire Harness & Fabrication Position Introduction: Rossell Techsys is the Aerospace and Defence (A&D) Division of Rossell India Limited (www.rossellindia.com). Rossell Techsys is based out of the technology hub of India - Bangalore.Rossell Techsys employs a little under 100 staff members and has aggressive growth plans to meet the emerging challenges of the Indian Aerospace and Defence Industry, including potential offset business in India. Rossell Techsys has four core competency areas - Custom embedded systems product development, Test solution design and development including test jigs, rigs, and simulators, Wire harness engineering & looming and Product Support Services. Rossell Techsys is AS9100 Rev C and IS0 9001, 14001(EMS), 27001(ISMS) certified organisation. Rossell Techsys is a CEMILAC approved design house. Positions: This position is for Member - Staff level as an individual contributor with 2 to 10 years of experience. Qualifications and Credentials: Candidates must be at least Diploma in Electronics and Electrical,with excellent academic credentials, from premier educational institutes. Given the kind of vision that Rossell TechSys has set for itself, candidates must not only be worthy professionals, but fundamentally, mature in all aspects of their personality, be able to work in an invigorating, team oriented, and global engineering environment. A belief of 'competing with one's own self' would be good to start with. Candidates with prior experience in aviation and defense domain would be given preference. Candidate who satisfies at least a part of the technical requirements and most of the personality requirements would be exciting candidates to meet with. Technical Requirements: Mandatory / Primary Skills Hands on experience in wiring harness fabrication with knowledge in various cable finishing tools and techniques such as crimp, solder, splicing, potting, sleeving, printing, Connectorisation, etc Knowledge of wire harness components and manufacturing process used in the cable industry is a must. Experience in Aircraft Looms and RF cables will be a plus. Knowledge on Wire Harness In process Inspection stages IPC/WHMA-620 A trained candidate will be a huge plus. Must have worked in an ISO 9001-2008 QMS environment. Experience with AS9100B will be a huge plus. As at this time, we are not working in shifts, however, over time, this position entails working in shifts. Secondary Skills Domain skills in the Aviation and Defense sector. Mechanical CAD design experience will be a huge plus. A fearless attitude to engineering related work. Yet having the good use of common sense and knowing when to take the risk and when not to. Personality Requirements: Candidate must have good communication skills Must have a positive attitude and display maturity in understanding that organizational goals and objectives take precedence to individual goals and objectives. Compensation: Selected Candidates shall be offered benchmark compensation packages and rewards for high performance. Joining Time: Selected Candidates are expected to join within 2 to 4 weeks. References: Selected Candidates will be required to provide a minimum of 2 references on employment. user: job description for the position of business development manager
jobdescription: LimeTray is a product-start-up helping restaurants market, engage and sell to more customers online. 6 out of 10 restaurants shut down in less than a year of starting up & this is not because they serve bad food or are expensive but because they fail to reach out to enough customers to cover costs. With its data driven products and services, LimeTray makes it easier for such restaurants to tap the customer base that now lives online. LimeTray has been one of the fastest growing start-ups in India, and is present Pan India in cities like Delhi, Bangalore, Hyderabad, Mumbai, Navi Mumbai, Pune, Chennai, Ahmedabad, Chandigarh, Jaipur and other cities; in the period of only 2 years and 6 months; with around 250+ employees all over India. Our founding team consists of ISB, NSIT alumni with strong-domain knowledge having built one of the largest online food ordering portal before and we count very successful internet entrepreneurs as our angel investors & advisors. We are also backed by Matrix Partners, one of the top 5 VC firms in India. When you work with us, you work with a peer group that comprises of people who have previously worked at companies like McKinsey & Company, JP Morgan, Bain & Company, Zomato, FoodPanda and Rocket Internet We manage a 1200+ clientele which includes Big Brands like Burger King, Subway, Brekkie, MK Dabbawala, Krispe Kreme, Tummy Kart, Leopold Cafe, Kaati Zone, Rolls on Wheels, Bhukkad, Beijing Bites, The Chocolate Room, Calvins, Khan Saheb, Night Panda, Tikki TIkki, and many more. We at LimeTray believe in the power of Hustle, Hunger and Ambition. We are excited to face new challenges to further explore our potential and think beyond. Everyone in the team hence has a very high sense of ownership & is given a lot of responsibilities. So, now we are looking for energetic, self motivated and passionate people who can join us quick and get the magic started Responsibilities - Personally contact and secure new business accounts/orders through a relationship-based approach. - Demonstrate products and services to existing and potential customers and assist them in selecting those best suited to their needs. - Achieve maximum sales profitability, growth and account penetration within an assigned Territory and/or market segment by effectively selling the company's products and services. user: job description for the position of devops engineer
jobdescription: Role purpose : The 1FBSSPL DevOps Engineer (DOE) will manage and maintain software development systems, java-based application servers, and apache web servers. Reports to: Senior General Manager (IT Head - India) Working Hours: 2:00pm 11:00pm Reported by: Nil (Individual Contributor Role) Job Overview : The 1FBSSPL DevOps Engineer (DOE) will manage and maintain software development systems, java-based application servers, and apache web servers. The DevOps Engineer will assist in the design of robust java-based application architectures that use Weblogic, TIBCO BusinessWorks, F5 network devices, and apache web servers. The DOE will work to improve the operation and reliability of software development systems and application servers through automated monitoring and automation of common tasks. Essential Functions and Responsibilities : Build new software development systems and upgrade and patch existing systems. Act as liaison between software development groups and the Operations group to resolve issues with system configuration and behavior. Configure, patch, and maintain Linux-based application servers and other development servers. Work closely with U.S. based software development teams and Operations personnel to insure development environments are correctly configured. Be quick to recognize tasks which can be automated and then automate them to reduce manual effort and improve repeatability. Conduct performance and fault analysis on applications with the assistance of software developers. Deploy web applications in a clustered and load balanced N-Tier infrastructure Write and maintain documentation involving job related functions. Job Requirements : Minimum 5 years of total relevant experience. Three years of experience in a previous DevOps role working with UNIX/linux servers and with java applications on Weblogic application servers. Experience writing complex shell scripts. Weblogic Java Application Server administration and tuning experience. Expert level understanding of networking/distributed computing concepts and client/server applications Linux administration experience (e.g. Ubuntu, RedHat/CentOS) with a focus on web (Apache) and Ansible would be a plus. Experience with Nagios, writing Nagios Scripts Understanding of protocols and technologies like HTTP, SSL, LDAP, JDBC, Servlet/JSP, HTML, XML Understand application clustering/load balancing concepts and technologies Excellent verbal and written communications skills in English are required. Ability to handle change and a self-starting attitude are required. Ability to work independently and also coordinate with others and to prioritize projects as well as combining research and expertise to assist organization. A passion for providing excellent service Salary: Not Disclosed by Recruiter Industry: IT-Software / Software Services Functional Area: IT Software - Application Programming , Maintenance Role Category:Programming & Design Role:Release Manager Keyskills Ansible Unix Python Scripting continuous integration build and deployment build and release and deployment Desired Candidate Profile Please refer to the Job description above Education- UG: Any Graduate - Any Specialization Company Profile: IFB Support Services Pvt. The Company is engaged in the business of providing information technology management services, risk management services and contact centre based customer support and collection services to its parent 1st Financial Bank USA (1FBUSA). 1FBUSA is an FDIC-insured, state-chartered bank headquartered in Dakota Dunes, South Dakota, founded in 1910. It has multiple subsidiary operations in various locations across the United States. The bank is a leading provider of financial services to college students and graduates from coast to coast, and is committed to providing quality community banking services in South Dakota. 1FBSSPL offers you the opportunity to learn the credit card business, work with the latest technology, build new applications and systems, interact with US colleagues and have a direct impact on business outcomes in a collegial, family atmosphere and state-of-the-art work environment. Job description : Defect Reduction team, you will lead a team of Program managers and analysts responsible for shaping the strategy and direction of customer-facing products that are core to the customer experience. Effectively manage customer expectations and resolve conflicts that balance client and company needs. Use quantitative and qualitative data to prioritize and influence, show creativity, experimentation and innovation, and drive projects with urgency in this fast-paced environment. Build and manage a very strong team of program managers and analysts who use data and metrics to drive decision-making and innovate on behalf of the customer. Partner with key stakeholders to develop the vision and strategy for customer experience on our platforms. Influence product roadmaps based on this strategy along with your teams. jobdescription: CE Mission Statement : To build India's most loved fashion brand by offering differentiated customer experience. user: job description for the position of controller
jobdescription: Basic Function:â€¯The controller position is responsible for the accounting operations of the firm, including the production of periodic financial reports, maintenance of an adequate system of accounting records, and a comprehensive set of controls and budgets designed to mitigate risk, enhance the accuracy of the firm's reported financial results, and ensure that reported results comply with generally accepted accounting principles or international financial reporting standards. Management 1. Maintain a documented system of accounting policies and procedures 2. Manage outsourced functions 3. Oversee the operations of the accounting department, including the design of an organizational structure adequate for achieving the department's goals and objectives Transactions 1. Ensure that accounts payable are paid in a timely manner and based on internal analysis to establish appropriate priorities 2. Ensure that all reasonable discounts are taken on accounts payable 3. Ensure that accounts receivable are collected promptly 4. Ensure that payroll is processed in a timely manner 5. Ensure that periodic bank reconciliations are completed 6. Ensure that required debt payments are made on a timely basis 7. Maintain the chart of accounts 8. Maintain an orderly accounting filing system 9. Maintain a system of controls over accounting transactions Reporting 1. Issue timely and complete financial statements 2. Coordinate the preparation of the corporate annual report 3. Recommend benchmarks against which to measure the performance of company operations 4. Calculate and issue financial and operating metrics 5. Manage the production of the annual budget and forecasts 6. Calculate variances from the budget and report significant issues to management 7. Provide for a system of management cost reports 8. user: job description for the position of machine learning nlp expert candidates from premier institutes only
jobdescription: Overview: As we continue to expand our artificial intelligence platform, Amelia, we are looking for NLP experts to join our development team. We need great scientists who also are great coders. Our scientists tackle the big challenges in deep language understanding and are passionate about writing sustainable code to implement advanced ideas. Whether from published research or their own approaches, our scientists identify and integrate the best science available all to create the best new NLP capability possible. We are looking for a hands-on scientist and developer ready to tackle the big challenges in deep language understanding. With an extensive existing customer base and a market-leading position in help desk automation, your work will go into production as soon as it shows measurable improvement over current methods. We think long term, while putting our research into practice on a rational schedule. Responsibilities: The ideal candidate will have both a research and development background. Having a history of peer-reviewed scientific publications in NLP is a plus. We have interest in candidates with a machine learning background and approach to NLP. We are also interested in candidates with a rule-based NLP background and knowledge of linguistic semantics. We have interest in candidates with experience in many portions of the NLP pipeline, including parsing, word sense disambiguation, knowledge extraction, question answering and language generation. Open source development experience is a plus. Ability to code in Java is required. You will lead an area of development of the pipeline, guiding and mentoring junior developers, working with the leads of the other areas of the pipeline and the lead scientist to create and deploy new capabilities in language understanding. You should be passionate about writing good and sustainable code to implement your advanced ideas. You will be expected to identify and integrate the best science available, whether from published research or your own approach. You will work with test and analysis engineers to prove your ideas against objective and measurable tests of capability. Each day you will be expected to move as needed between designing scientific approaches and architecture, writing or contributing to scientific publications, mentoring, and development in Java, all in the service of creating the best new NLP capability possible. Good scientists must also be good communicators, able to explain and justify complex ideas to junior developers and senior management, both verbally and in writing. You should be comfortable defining delivery schedules and metrics for performance assessment and meeting your targets. First and foremost we need great scientists who also are great coders. A mature coder should be able to learn a new framework quickly, so experience with each of the items below just helps us understand your implementation experience, but each is desirable. o -Development tools such as Maven, Jenkins, Ant, Eclipse o -Comfortable on Apple or Linux OSes o -Java Spring, Guava, JDBC, Tomcat, JUnit Qualifications: Bachelors degree in Computer Science from IIT/ IISc/ NITs/ Bits/ DCE/ ITBHU/ Guindy / Top US universities 1-3 Years Experience in Machine Learning and NLP Salary:INR 12,00,000 - 22,00,000 P.A Industry: IT-Software / Software Services Functional Area: IT Software - Application Programming , Maintenance Role Category:Programming & Design Role:Software Developer Keyskills Machine Learning nlp natural language processing Desired Candidate Profile Please refer to the Job description above Education- UG: B.Tech/B.E. - Computers PG:Post Graduation Not Required, M.Tech - Computers Doctorate:Doctorate Not Required Company Profile: IPsoft Global Services Private Limited About Company ABOUT IPSOFT IPsoft is a global, industry-leading managed services company offering a complete solution to enterprise customers for outsourcing global IT operations. We offer a full range of managed services to our clients, from management at the individual component, device and network level to the analysis, design and management of complex business processes. IPsoft's unique (and proprietary) automation technology remediates more than half of the detected exceptions in our managed client environments. We manage our customers' systems through our worldwide Network Operations Centers located in New York City (HQ), London, Amsterdam and Bangalore. IPsoft has been solidly profitable since its inception as a company in 1998, and has roughly doubled its gross revenues for four straight years; we are on a trajectory to continue this rapid growth pace, meaning that you will have an opportunity to grow with the company. CULTURE IPsoft is committed to helping our employees develop their full potential in both business and technical spheres, and it is our policy to recognize excellent performance by promoting from within. IPsoft is a fast-paced, energetic and fun place to work. We're changing the way managed services are delivered to customers, and we're looking for people who want to make a difference. The best evidence that IPsoft is a good place to work? People come to work here and stay. If you come to work at IPsoft, you'll be working with cutting-edge technologies and the bright, driven people who develop them. Download PPT Photo 1  View Contact Details

jobdescription: Excellent Opportunity for young marketing specialist to work for TOP Notch/ Fastest Growing Healthcare Organization. Join Apollo Sugar India! Apollo Sugar Clinics is an innovative, single specialty diabetes and endocrine healthcare service provider, formed as a collaboration between Apollo Hospitals Group and Sanofi (Global Pharma MNC). Apollo Sugar believes that human capital is the key to the success of our organization. We have built a culture of collaboration between teams that ensures growth of individuals and the organization. Our work environment drives innovation and passion towards patient service. We recruit & engage the best talent pool towards fulfillment of our core objectives - compassion and care of our patients. With the expertise and knowledge of our international partners, we bring global standards, in the field of single specialty clinics. Apollo Sugar is an equal opportunity employer and promotes diversity in our workforce. If you are compassionate with a flair for service excellence that you think can provide healing touch to improve the lives of people around you, Apollo Sugar is the place for you. Join our team to leverage career opportunities and achieve long term success. Our talent pool comprises of specialists in Medical Services, Marketing, Finance, HR, IT, Operations & Quality domain. In our clinics operation, we endeavor to impart quality experience to our multi-disciplinary care specialists comprising Endocrinologists, Diabetologists, Operations Incharges, Patient Care Facilitators, Diabetes Specialist Nurses, Dieticians, Diabetic Educators, and Sales & Marketing lead's with meaningful assignments to enhance their skills and expertise at par with global standards. To know more about your career options, connect with Apollo Sugar HR Partners and discover how successful you can be with us. More About Apollo Sugar (read more at www.apollosugar.com) India is home to over 65 million diabetics and more than 50 million pre-diabetics. More than 30 million Indians are unknown diabetics (not yet diagnosed but afflicted). The need of the hour is to address this endemic with a dedicated, comprehensive model of care - Apollo Sugar Clinics is the answer. Apollo Sugar (An Apollo Group Company) is an innovative care delivery business focused on providing assured care for Diabetics. With 30 years of the Apollo group's heritage and quality healthcare delivery behind it, Apollo Sugar was founded on the vision to make diabetes disease free. We are building the largest pan-India single specialty clinics model for Diabetes. Our vision is 'disease-free diabetes' and our mission is to provide proven and comprehensive care to the diabetic being cared for, and not just the disorder - to keep co-morbidities or related complications of the heart, kidneys, eyes, nerves, feet at bay. We successfully deliver robust patient outcomes by staffing each Sugar clinic with best in class multi-disciplinary care teams of doctors, dieticians, trained diabetes specific nurses and counselors, backed with proven treatment protocols and lifestyle management interventions to enable our customers to keep their Diabetes in good control and live a disease free lifestyle. We currently have 35+ Apollo Sugar clinics that are operational pan India across major cities, and are fast scaling up to our footprint to help provide proven, quality care for millions of more diabetic patients across India. Collaborate with engineering to ensure technology match occurs between supply partners and engineering & manufacturings to ensure capable product and factory fulfillment requirements are met. user: job description for the position of product support specialist logistimo
jobdescription: Looking for a job or career at a fast-growing and highly impactful industry to empower people and society? Are you looking for an opportunity to take ownership and drive results? Look no further because Logistimo is the place for you! Logistimo pioneers mobile and web supply chain technology for rural emerging markets across Healthcare, Consumer goods, Agricultural goods, Waste management and Humanitarian action. Customers include agencies of the UN, Ministries of Health of different countries, Public Health Units, Retailers, Distributors, Transporters, Wholesalers and Producers seeking deeper integration of the first- and last-mile of their value chains. From Asia to Africa, at Logistimo, they apply technology to improve supply chain performance, create greater transparency, decrease operating costs and provide clients with a competitive advantage. Based in Bangalore, Logistimo needs a capable and motivated Product Support Specialist to help provide the best support on the Logistimo product for all its users. Key skills required include an ability to manage product issues or requests raised at various levels and integrate them to the product pipeline in coordination with the engineering team. Another key aspect of the role is to provide all levels of customer support to users including prioritizing escalations, new feature launches, creating easy reference guides/FAQ, user issue analysis etc. Helping to derive client insights and drive process transformation, this role presents a unique opportunity to make a tangible difference in rural healthcare, agriculture, disaster response and beyond. Target salary range is highly competitive (7 - 12L CTC) and will be based on previous experience, subject to customary increases on joining. This is not a shift based role; you will be working regular office hours (which will be same as rest of Logistimo team). Detailed Responsibilities: Investigate, diagnose and respond to technical questions and issues received from customers Provide thorough product support across all levels (large technical issues and granular - device related issues) Promptly answer support related emails , phone calls and other communications Log reported bugs to the engineering team via bug reporting platforms Partner with the engineering team to ensure filed bug fixes are completed within the stipulated time frame Support pilot deployments across new regions with new customers; provide direct and ongoing user support; provide onsite training for users; monitor and report support data across multiple metrics Gather, consolidate and present data periodically from the customer request tools to internal stakeholders Design, test and implement improvements in the tools and processes deployed by the customer success team in partnership with multiple stakeholders Create and update the technical support 'FAQ library' periodically, in collaboration with the internal communications team Keep abreast of new features and product enhancements Salary:INR 7,00,000 - 12,00,000 P.A. Based on previous experience, subject to customary increases on joining. Experience in collaborating with internal teams (product, technical, business, etc) to resolve customer issues is a mustExperience in product management - providing product related (technical)support. user: job description for the position of senior software engineer technical lead java
jobdescription: Job Summary : The Technical Lead will perform Java based software design, development and deployment tasks. Work Timings : 11:00am to 8:00pm (3 days in a week) 2:00pm 11:00pm (2 days in a week depending on project needs) Experience : Minimum 6 years Key Areas of Responsibility and Accountability The Technical Lead candidate shall work as an individual contributor (approximately 70 of the time) by doing Analysis, Design Development and Unit Tests. 30 of the time shall be spent in mentoring juniors, design and code reviews and participation in discussions on architectural design and maintenance of systems. The Technical Lead role requires the ability to mentor/ help a small team of software engineers through the development lifecycle, driving successful and timely completion of technical tasks. The successful candidate will have the ability to adjust quickly to shifting priorities and multiple deadlines. Should have the ability to understand, explain and communicate technical concepts. The incumbent must have significant hands-on technical experience in all phases of the software development life cycle of enterprise-wide applications. This includes having the ability to interpret design application architectures, to incorporate best of breed technologies capable of meeting business requirements, to contribute to system performance and to resolve technical issues. Skill and experience requirements  Ability to program in all tiers of a typical J2EE application (Front-end, Business layer and O/R mapping/DAO layer) Write new code and enhance existing code Design code using core design patterns Maintain disciplined software engineering practices in day to day development work Perform functional design review, code reviews & unit tests Perform process reviews to ensure that software engineering processes meet changing business conditions and remain consistent with industry best practices Minimum seven years of industry experience in object-oriented software design and development. Experience with Web Logic or Oracle 10gAS and an excellent understanding of database technologies and persistence techniques. Thorough understanding of technical concepts as they apply to N-tier distributed computing and to end-to-end performance, availability, reliability, security, integration and configurability of software applications. Excellent conceptual understanding and extensive hands-on experience with Java, XML, EJB, JSP, Servlets, JMS/MQ, JDBC, Struts, spring, Hibernate, Ajax and other J2EE technologies. Proficiency with both NT and UNIX environments, including software deployment and execution. Experience in development using TIBCO BusinessWorks integration tool will be advantage. Associated requirements  Establish an environment of learning and growth keeping organizational values and operating policies in mind. Facilitate and support the delivery of excellent quality product releases Review team members implementation to ensure they follow the design and coding guidelines. Work with developers to resolve their technical issues & mentor them. Work with QA to improve test plans. Report work status on technical tasks to program manager. Traffic online and mobile ad campaigns/creative in DBM, AppNexus & Brightroll ad servers. Q management, updating the tickets in Google doc and sending the status emails to the client on pending tickets, confirmation tickets and closed tickets. Leave management. Creates the training plan for new jonnies. Escalate issues which cannot be resolved by the team. Provide guidance to the team based on management direction. Coordinates meetings. Work with functional managers to obtain necessary resources to support the team's requirements. Help keep the team focused and on track. Maintain healthy group dynamics. Responsible for uniform distribution of volumes within the team. jobdescription: Overview: Datamar India is looking for experienced and skilled Admin, HR & Finance Controller who can coordinate office operations and procedures, in order to ensure organizational effectiveness, efficiency and safety. The ideal candidate will be experienced in handling a wide range of administrative and executive support related tasks and will be able to work independently with little or no supervision. This person must be exceedingly well organized, flexible and enjoy the administrative challenges of supporting an office of diverse people. Datamar India is a data and market intelligence provision company working in the maritime and foreign trade sector with a focus on the East Coast of South America. The company partners with major transport companies such as ship and port operators to gather, process and distribute data that helps organizations make decisions on strategic, commercial and operational matters. Responsibilities: Admin, HR & Finance Controller will be responsible for overseeing the full range of maintaining and enhancing the organizations Administration, Finance and Human Resources by planning, implementing, and evaluating employee relations and human resources policies, programs and practices. Admin, HR & Finance Controller will also be part of the senior management team and will have the opportunity to bring an HR and Administrative perspective to the organisation. Administration: Oversee office in maintaining files and centralized databases Manage office facilities administration Serves as the go-to for office inquiries and conflicts Plan and coordinate administrative procedures and systems and devise ways to streamline processes Manage schedules and deadlines Monitor inventory of office supplies and the purchasing of new material with attention to budgetary constrains Organise and supervise other office activities Human Resources: Be the first point of contact for all HR-related queries Administer HR-related documentation, such as contracts of employment Ensure the relevant HR database is up to date, accurate and complies with legislation Plan, implements, and manages the human resources function, including recruiting, employee relations, regulatory compliances, benefits, staff developments, and employee communications Investigates employee relations issues such as disciplinary and grievances Effectively communicate HR policies, procedures, programs and laws organization wide Finance: Achieves financial objectives by anticipating requirements; submitting information for budget preparation; scheduling expenditures; monitoring costs; analysing variances. Monitor cost and expenses, maintenance activities and tradespersons Responsible for Capital & Expense budget Tracking budget expenses Manage day to day finances, make payments to vendors and service providers. Coordinate with outsourced accountancy service, in regards to payroll management, and other financial matters. Qualifications and Experience: Bachelors degree and a minimum of five years of related experience Strong working knowledge of and experience in Indian labour law and local regulations Proven experience as administration management, supervisory, budgeting skills Outstanding communication skills, both verbal and written Proven ability to establish priorities and meet deadlines Outstanding organizational skills; the ability to multi-task and make decisions under pressure In-depth understanding of office management procedures and departmental and legal policies Familiarity with financial and facilities management principles Proficient in MS Office An analytical mind with problem-solving skills A team player with leadership skills This is a challenging opportunity for a dedicated and highly motivated professional.
